text: This is awesome, and exactly the kind of thing I’m hoping to do in my custom editor.  The way it currently works for me is that I can reserve pixels above and below a current text line; and then render custom graphics in that space.  But your image inspires me to do inline things too; I had previously thought about a custom comment marker that gets replaced.  Like /* SlideFloat */
